Compute summary statistics for R code AST

Source: R/ast-walk.R
ast_stats.Rd

Parses the code and returns counts of calls, assignments, symbols, expressions, and maximum nesting depth.

Usage

ast_stats(code)

Arguments

code

Character(1). R code to analyse.

Value

A named list with components:

n_calls

Number of function calls.

n_assignments

Number of assignment operations (including <-, =, ->, <<-, ->>, and assign()).

n_symbols

Number of symbol (name) references.

depth

Maximum AST nesting depth.

n_expressions

Number of top-level expressions.
